opennlp.tools.parser.lang.es

类 AncoraSpanishHeadRules

  • java.lang.Object
    • opennlp.tools.parser.lang.es.AncoraSpanishHeadRules
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    GapLabeler, HeadRules, SerializableArtifact

    public class AncoraSpanishHeadRules
extends Object
implements HeadRules, GapLabeler, SerializableArtifact
    Class for storing the Ancora Spanish head rules associated with parsing. In this class headrules for noun phrases are specified. The rest of the rules are in opennlp-tools/lang/es/parser/es-head-rules NOTE: This class has been adapted from opennlp.tools.parser.lang.en.HeadRules The main change is the constituents search direction in the first for loop. Note also the change in the return of the getHead() method: In the lang.en.HeadRules class: return constituents[ci].getHead(); Now: return constituents[ci]; Other changes include removal of deprecated methods.

      • AncoraSpanishHeadRules

        public AncoraSpanishHeadRules(Reader rulesReader)
                       throws IOException
        Creates a new set of head rules based on the specified reader.
        参数:
        rulesReader - the head rules reader.
        抛出:
        IOException - if the head rules reader can not be read.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getPunctuationTags

        public Set<String> getPunctuationTags()
        从接口复制的说明: HeadRules
        Returns the set of punctuation tags. Attachment decisions for these tags will not be modeled.
        指定者:
        getPunctuationTags 在接口中 HeadRules
        返回:
        the set of punctuation tags.

      • getHead

        public Parse getHead(Parse[] constituents,
                     String type)
        从接口复制的说明: HeadRules
        Returns the head constituent for the specified constituents of the specified type.
        指定者:
        getHead 在接口中 HeadRules
        参数:
        constituents - The constituents which make up a constituent of the specified type.
        type - The type of a constituent which is made up of the specified constituents.
        返回:
        The constituent which is the head.

      • labelGaps

        public void labelGaps(Stack<Constituent> stack)
        从接口复制的说明: GapLabeler
        Labels the constituents found in the stack with gap labels if appropriate.
        指定者:
        labelGaps 在接口中 GapLabeler
        参数:
        stack - The stack of un-completed constituents.

      • serialize

        public void serialize(Writer writer)
               throws IOException
        Writes the head rules to the writer in a format suitable for loading the head rules again with the constructor. The encoding must be taken into account while working with the writer and reader.

        After the entries have been written, the writer is flushed. The writer remains open after this method returns.

        参数:
        writer -
        抛出:
        IOException
